title: Are Rams a Super Bowl threat? Blaming Zach Wilson? 'The Office' stories; Playoff bubble teams
itunes:title: Are Rams a Super Bowl threat? Blaming Zach Wilson? 'The Office' stories; Playoff bubble teams
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and guest co-host and actor, Brian Baumgartner react to the resurging Los Angeles Rams after their division victory over the Arizona Cardinals on Monday Night Football. Then they share if it's fair to blame Zach Wilson for the Jets struggles; Brian delivers cameo messages for Tom Brady to Bill Belichick, to Dan Campbell, and to Derrick Henry; they're joined by Scott Pioli and he explains why the Buffalo Bills are struggling and how valuable Bill Belichick is to the New England Patriots; Brian explains how he got the gig as Kevin, how Phyllis got her gig on The Office, and what made Steve Carell a great leader on the set.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
